title: #HpeiLOAccountCertificateMap.v1_0_1.HpeiLOAccountCertificateMap
description: This is the schema definition for mapping X509 certificates to user accounts.

UserName.description: The name used to log in to the management processor.

Fingerprint.description: The fingerprint which uniquely identifies the mapped certificate.

FingerprintDigestAlgorithm.description: The algorithm used to calculate the fingerprint.
